- ğŸ“Š **Open Telemetry Support**: Built on OTEL standards for comprehensive tracing
- ğŸ”„ **Real-time Monitoring**: Track LLM API calls, vector operations, and framework usage
- ğŸ¯ **Performance Insights**: Analyze latency, costs, and usage patterns

genes.title: app æ¨¡å—è¯´æ˜
genes.content:
```typescript
npm i @langtrase/typescript-sdk
```

```typescript
import * as Langtrace from '@langtrase/typescript-sdk' // Must precede any llm module imports
Langtrace.init({ api_key: <your_api_key> })
```

OR

```typescript
import * as Langtrace from "@langtrase/typescript-sdk"; // Must precede any llm module imports
LangTrace.init(); // LANGTRACE_API_KEY as an ENVIRONMENT variable
```
